pages.text: Xindao de renmen shuo:“Zenme bu jiang shi yi zhang jing ne?” Dang mingque de yi zhang jing wen jiangxia, er qizhong ti ji zhanzheng de shihou, ni hui kan dao xinzhong you bing de renmen jiang xiang lin si shi hun yun de ren nayang deng zhuoyan kan ni. Shang zai tamen
Fucong hewan ci, yu tamen shi geng xiangyi de. Dang zhanzheng bei jueding de shihou, jiaruo tamen zhongyu an la, na duiyu tamen shi geng hao de
Jiaruo nimen zhizheng, nimen hui bu hui zai difang shang zuo'e, bing duanjue qinqi de guanxi ne
Zhe deng ren, shi an la suo qi jue de, gu ta shi tamen bian long, shi tamen bian xia
Tamen zenme bu chensi “gulanjing” ne? Nandao tamen de xin shang you suo
Ren qing zhengdao, ranhou pan jiao zhe, emo songyong tamen, bing kuanwei tamen
Na shi yinwei tamen ceng dui naxie yanwu an la suo jiang shi de jixiang zhe shuo:“Duiyu yibufen shiqing, women jiang shuncong nimen.” An la zhidao tamen de yinqing
Dangzhong tianshi dazhe tamen de lian he bei, er shi tamen siwang de shihou, tamen jiang zenme ban ne
Na shi yinwei tamen shuncong na chufan an la de shiwu, bing yanwu tasuo xiyue de shiwu, gu ta shi tamen de shangong wuxiao
Nandao xinzhong you bing de renmen yiwei an la bu jiechuan tamen de yuanhen me
